Detailed Description

It holds single field value.

◆ reset()

db_result_t storage::data::SingleField::reset ( )
protected

Clear data and binding.

Returns
  • DB_OK when successful.

  • DB_FAIL on failure.

    On failure, one of the following error codes is set:

    • DB_EINVAL Invalid row handle.

Returns
  • DB_OK when successful.

  • DB_FAIL on failure.

    On failure, one of the following error codes is set:

    • DB_EINVAL Invalid row handle.

◆ bind() [2/3]

db_result_t storage::data::SingleField::bind ( const FieldDefinition &  fielddef)
inlineprotected

Bind a field definition.

Parameters
fielddefField definition
Returns
  • DB_OK when successful.

  • DB_FAIL on failure.

    On failure, one of the following error codes is set:

    • DB_EINVAL Number of fields being bound is 0, binding structure is not valid, data type is not known and autosize is selected.
    • DB_EBINDSIZE Invalid bind size.Datatype and size dont match.

◆ bind() [3/3]

db_result_t storage::data::SingleField::bind ( db_fieldno_t  fieldno,
db_vartype_t  data_type,
void *  data_ptr,
db_len_t  data_size,
db_len_t *  data_ind = NULL,
uint32_t  data_flags = 0 
)
inlineprotected

Bind a column to an absolute memory address. Field definition.

Parameters
fieldnoField index number
data_typeField data type
data_ptr
  • For absolute bindings, the memory address at which to read and write data.
  • For relative bindings, the memory offset at which to read and write data.
data_sizeThe size, in bytes, of the memory buffer to which the field is bound.
data_ind
  • For absolute bindings, the memory address of the field length indicator.

  • For relative bindings, the memory offset of the field length indicator.

    The field length indicator is a value of type db_len_t that provides information aboue the length of field when stored in database. The length indicator is optional can be disabled by setting data_ind to zero. When data is written to the database , the length indicator provides instructions on how to use the bound memory buffer. The following values are permitted.

    • A non negative number - Length of data to write
    • DB_FIELD_NULL - Indicates that Filed is NULL.
    • DB_NTS - Treat Field as NULL terminated string.
    • DB_AUTOFIELD - Manage length automatically.
data_flagsBinding flags. Select a type of binding to use:
  • DB_BIND_ABSOLUTE if the field uses an absolute binding.
  • DB_BIND_RELATIVE if the field uses a elative binding.
Returns
  • DB_OK when successful.

  • DB_FAIL on failure.

    On failure, one of the following error codes is set:

    • DB_EINVAL Caused by: number of fields being bound is 0, binding structure is not valid, data type is not known and autosize is selected.
    • DB_EBINDSIZE Invalid bind size.Datatype and size dont match.

◆ fetch()

db_result_t storage::data::SingleField::fetch ( db_cursor_t  cursor)

Stores the content of the next row from cursor to a single field.

Parameters
cursorCursor handle
Returns
  • DB_OK when successful.

  • DB_FAIL on failure.

    On failure, one of the following error codes is set:

    • DB_EINVAL Caused by: invalid cursor handle, invalid row handle.
    • DB_ENOTFOUND Cursor is not positioned on a row.No data was read.
Postcondition
A transaction is active on database if the operation succeeds.

  • NULL on failure.

    On failure, one of the following error codes is set:

    • DB_EINVAL Invalid input parameter.

  • false if the field does not exist

◆ set_null()

db_result_t storage::data::Field::set_null ( )
inlineinherited

Set the field value to null.

Returns
  • DB_OK when successful.

  • DB_FAIL on failure.

    On failure, one of the following error codes is set:

    • DB_EINVAL Invalid row handle.
    • DB_EFIELD Field identified by nfield does not exist.
Note
To make a field not null, use set().

◆ set_field()

db_result_t storage::data::Field::set_field ( const Field &  o)
inlineinherited

Set the field to the value of another field. Type conversion is attempted if the other field has a different type.

Parameters
oAnother field to be copied
Returns
  • DB_OK when successful.

  • DB_FAIL on failure.

    On failure, one of the following error codes is set:

    • DB_EINVAL Invalid row handle.
    • DB_EFIELD Field error.Invalid field number.
    • DB_ECONVERT Conversion is not possible (Incompatible types).
    • DB_EBINDSIZE Invalid bind size.

◆ get() [1/2]

template<typename T >
db_len_t storage::data::Field::get ( T &  value) const
inlineinherited

Get the value of the field and store it into a variable. The type T must support Bind Traits.

Returns
Length of the returned data,
  • DB_FIELD_NULL if null, or
  • DB_LEN_FAIL on failure.

void *  dest,
db_len_t  size 
) const
inlineinherited

Copy the value of the field to dest, a pointer to a variable of the type specified by ctype.

Parameters
ctypeVariable type of the dest buffer.
destPointer to a buffer where the returned value is to be stored.
sizeLength of dest buffer in bytes.
Returns
Length of the returned data,
  • DB_FIELD_NULL if null, or
  • DB_LEN_FAIL on failure.

Parameters
valueValue with type T
Returns
  • DB_OK when successful.

  • DB_FAIL on failure.

    On failure, one of the following error codes is set:

    • DB_EINVAL Invalid row handle.
    • DB_EFIELD Field error.Invalid field number.
    • DB_ECONVERT Conversion is not possible (Incompatible types).
    • DB_EBINDSIZE Invalid bind size.

db_result_t storage::data::Field::set ( db_vartype_t  ctype,
const void *  source,
db_len_t  len 
)
inlineinherited

Set the value for the field from source, a pointer to a variable of the type specified by ctype.

Parameters
ctypeVariable type of the source buffer.
sourcePointer to a buffer that contains a value.
lenLength of source buffer in characters or bytes, depending on type.
Returns
  • DB_OK when successful.

  • DB_FAIL on failure.

    On failure, one of the following error codes is set:

    • DB_EINVAL Invalid row handle.
    • DB_EFIELD Field error.Invalid field number.
    • DB_ECONVERT Conversion is not possible (Incompatible types).
    • DB_EBINDSIZE Invalid bind size.

◆ to()

template<typename T >
T storage::data::Field::to ( const T &  default_value = T()) const
inlineinherited

Return the value of the field by casting to type T. The type T must support BindTraits.

Parameters
default_valueIf an error occurs, default_value is returned instead. default_value is also returned if the field is null and the type T is not Nullable.
Returns
value of the field
